html:
5.13.20  1:40 pm   Have you seen or been seen by someone or something?

      holy moly that sounds familiar

5.13.20  1:25 pm   What's your favorite genre of music?

      regular

5.13.20  1:24 pm   How do I make sense of it all

      start by making sense of 1 thing at a time. sense is contagious, like disease, so it should take on exponential growth soon, and then more than 1 new thing at a time will make sense

5.13.20  12:43 pm   what is in the fragile box that cannot be opened?

      an even more fragile box

5.13.20  12:37 pm   I can never commit to an idea long enough to finish working on it. How do I deal with that?

      try shorter ideas

5.13.20  12:23 pm   How do you entertain your self at home that is not musically related?

      if you are wondering what's my idea of a good time, it's this

5.13.20  12:15 pm   what is the meaning of language?

     communication

      why do we need it?

     to communicate

5.13.20  12:04 pm   opinion on pillows?

      it's a bed, for your head. headbed

5.13.20  11:55 am   did you learn new lessons 

      yes, i am drowning in lessons. and yet still the flood continues

5.13.20  11:43 am   How do I make a sandwich?

      start putting bread on either side of things until you feel a special tingling sensation

5.13.20  11:14 am   Where is east virginia

      maybe like norfolk

5.13.20  11:11 am   I am making a song and I need some help. I need a four line verse with a rhyme scheme of AABB. Can you help me?

      no because first you have to be much more specific about the rhythm, and when those 'a' 'a' 'b' 'b' things occur, but besides that, i also need to know the melody if you already have one, which i would have to assume you do if you already know the rhyme scheme

5.13.20  11:04 am   What's your opinion on computers?

      very reasonable, understandable

5.13.20  11:01 am   How do you tame cows?

      you have to make them think they have tamed you

5.13.20  10:33 am   What does meaning mean?

      you

5.13.20  10:33 am   Is the world upside down ?

      no but i can see why you would think that

5.13.20  10:16 am   Do you have a favourite jazz chord or are they all equal?

      surprise, jazz chords are just regular chords

5.13.20  10:03 am   how do i write?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.13.20  9:54 am   What's the best stance to listen to your music?

      the 'pants' stance. this does not mean you are wearing pants, but it at least means you have respect for pants; have imagined pants before

5.13.20  9:47 am   How many eggs equal a chicken?

      just one, if you sit on it just right

5.13.20  8:39 am   How do you find inspiration?

      i have a bucket to catch the inspiration but sometimes the bucket itself inspires me

5.13.20  7:49 am   Are you stupid

      yes, and smart

5.13.20  7:44 am   is the earth a soup?

      no but i can see why you would think that

5.13.20  7:25 am   how do i connect to the internet

      do nothing. the internet will connect to you

5.13.20  6:15 am   Hi Bill, How are you? Are you working in any project right now?

      i am reinventing the graphics department. i did not plan this

5.13.20  5:39 am   What's your favorite pizza?

      vegetable pizza

5.13.20  4:28 am   When will you post more content? 

      every tuesday but not yet

5.13.20  4:14 am   what is a food

      scientists are trying to figure out

5.13.20  4:07 am   When corona's over, will you come to Australia!

      yes

5.13.20  3:55 am   What should I do if life gives me lemons?

      you are supposed to report them immediately to the lemon registry

5.13.20  3:33 am   how do you write your music?

      it's best if i trick the music into thinking it has tricked me into thinking i am writing it

5.13.20  2:49 am   How do you come up with songs

      i have to trick them into thinking they are thinking of me. and they are supposed to trick me into thinking i am thinking of them

5.13.20  2:47 am   I messed up a greeting and embarrassed myself. How do I erase my bad first impression?

      could do a benefit concert

5.13.20  2:25 am   What's up with the, "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes," response?

      that would be if my initial response would have been no, but then i thought a bit more and changed my opinion

5.13.20  2:17 am   Did you eventually make it to the South Pole by nightfall?

      i must have made it there at some point, because the video got made and it does include the south pole

5.13.20  2:07 am   do you have any other vids similar to just did a bad thing where it looks like you're interacting with the animations? it's quite cool

      i probably did that in 'might quit', and i might have done it in 'when i get older'. and i will be doing it a heck of a lot more for sure, that's a brand new technique, a lot of potential with that technique. barely even scratched the surface yet. Also i produced a reality video from nov 2010 (produced in 2019) where i made heavy use of that technique

5.13.20  2:05 am   will your music grant me immortality 

      no guarantees

5.13.20  1:56 am   what if i learned how to play the chords to every song i listened to?

     that might start to give you the ability to know chords to new songs after only hearing them once. or to be able to recall chords from songs you've heard before, but never thought about the chords for

     also what if i didn't?

      could probably find something else valuable to do with your time

5.13.20  1:37 am   opinion on pineapple pizza

      it's the backbone of modern civilization

5.13.20  1:37 am   What does "it" refer to when you say: "It's getting dark outside"?

      the whole world around us

5.13.20  1:11 am   i just did something really embarrassing, how do i get over it?

      make it into a folk tale. pass it down from generation to generation

5.13.20  12:41 am   Do you think Colorado is a government conspiracy? A fake state?

      no

5.13.20  12:27 am   Do you ever get song ideas from eggs?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.13.20  12:18 am   whats your favorite type of brick

      the kind they use in walls

5.13.20  12:10 am   are humans real?

      i can see why you would think that

5.13.20  12:06 am   Will wfaoie be a series?

      oh heck yeah

5.12.20  11:59 pm   how did you think of your editing style??

      just trying to get by

5.12.20  11:53 pm   Is blue a color

      oh that would explain a lot

5.12.20  11:16 pm   What's your favorite type of music

      NORMAL

5.12.20  10:56 pm   Who is your main inspiration In your music?

      oops, got inspired by everyone. now i can't tell which is which
